Keywords: Armor , Past , Soldier , Spider-Man Family
Real Name: Gwen Stacy
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Characters, Elevated
MY KIND OF ALLIES: When establishing themed teams, characters on your starting force with the Armor keyword gain the Spider-Man Family keyword.
CALL IN HELP FROM THE SPIDER-VERSE!: When Gwen Of Arc hits an opposing character, if no character has been placed this turn, after resolutions you may roll a d6. 3-6: Place another friendly character with the Spider-Man Family keyword adjacent.
MARTYRED BY BISHOP OSBORN: When Gwen Of Arc is KO'd by an opponent's attack, after resolutions heal all other friendly characters equal to the damage she was dealt.
RALLY FOR VICTORY!: Leadership. When Gwen Of Arc uses it and succeeds, when a friendly character hits this turn, after resolutions remove an action token from them.
